abstract: Anticipating restrictions on bonuses, officials at Citigroup and Morgan Stanley are exploring ways to sidestep tough new federal caps on compensation, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: Anticipating restrictions on bonuses, officials at Citigroup and Morgan Stanley are exploring ways to sidestep tough new federal caps on compensation, The Wall Street Journal reported.

headline.main: Banks Look to Sidestep Pay Caps, Report Says
